name: click or get explode lol
description:
alr ima try to get this fast

Click or get explode is a game where if you don't click the right box in time you lose a life. Honestly it's luck but who cares am I right?

This game is still in development and it's pretty bare bones rn but I'll try to keep working on it!

It works for Windows, Mac, and Linux(and browser play if you want, whatever floats your boat).
